Pot Calculation Test Cases

Test scenarios for tournament pot calculation validation ‚Ä¢ Antes = BB

TC-1.1
Simple Preflop - Everyone Calls
Low Basic ‚ñº
Stack Setup
50
100
100
BB First
üìã Copy and paste this into the app:
Hand (1)
started_at: 00:02:30 ended_at: 00:05:40
SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100
Stack Setup:
Charlie Dealer 10000
Alice SB 10000
Bob BB 10000
Actions
Preflop Base
Charlie (Dealer): Call 100
Alice (SB): Call 100
Bob (BB): Check
Expected Results
Total Pot: 400
BB Ante: 100
BB posts 100 ante (not part of BB's live contribution)
Main Pot
400 (100%)
Eligible: AliceBobCharlie
Live Contributions: 100 + 100 + 100 = 300
BB Ante: 100
Total: 400
Player (Position)Starting StackFinal StackLive ContributionTotal LostWinnerNew Stack
Alice (SB)10,0009,900100100 - 9,900
Bob (BB)10,0009,800100200 (100 blind + 100 ante) - 9,800
Charlie (Dealer)10,0009,900100100 üèÜ Main Pot ‚ñº
Final Stack: 9,900
+ Main Pot: 400
= New Stack: 10,300
 10,300
üìã Next Hand Preview
Hand (2) started_at: 00:05:40 ended_at: HH:MM:SS SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100 Stack Setup: Alice Dealer 9900 Bob SB 9800 Charlie BB 10300
üîç Compare with Actual Output
Notes
All players call to 100. BB posts 100 ante + 100 blind. Players match BB blind (100), not 200. Simple pot with ante from BB.
TC-2.2
One All-In Creates Side Pot
Medium Single All-In ‚ñº
Stack Setup
50
100
100
BB First
üìã Copy and paste this into the app:
Hand (2)
started_at: 00:02:30 ended_at: 00:05:40
SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100
Stack Setup:
Charlie Dealer 300
Alice SB 10000
Bob BB 10000
Actions
Preflop Base
Charlie (Dealer): All-in 300
Alice (SB): Raise 600
Preflop More 1
Bob (BB): Call 600
Expected Results
Total Pot: 1,600
BB Ante: 100
Main Pot
1,000 (62.5%)
Eligible: AliceBobCharlie
Calculation: 3 players √ó 300 = 900 + 100 dead = 1,000
Side Pot 1
600 (37.5%)
Eligible: AliceBob
Excluded: Charlie (all-in at 300)
Calculation: 2 players √ó 300 = 600
Player (Position)Starting StackFinal StackContributedWinnerNew Stack
Alice (SB)10,0009,400600 üèÜ Side Pot 1 ‚ñº
Final Stack: 9,400
+ Side Pot 1: 600
= New Stack: 10,000
 10,000
Bob (BB)10,0009,300700 (600 + 100 ante) - 9,300
Charlie (Dealer)3000300 üèÜ Main Pot ‚ñº
Final Stack: 0
+ Main Pot: 1,000
= New Stack: 1,000
 1,000
üìã Next Hand Preview
Hand (3) started_at: 00:05:40 ended_at: HH:MM:SS SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100 Stack Setup: Alice Dealer 10000 Bob SB 9300 Charlie BB 1000
üîç Compare with Actual Output
Notes
Charlie all-in 300. Alice raises 600. Bob calls 600. Main pot capped at Charlie's 300 (all 3 eligible). Side pot for additional 300 from Alice and Bob only.
TC-3.1
Two All-Ins at Different Amounts
High Multiple All-Ins ‚ñº
Stack Setup
50
100
100
BB First
üìã Copy and paste this into the app:
Hand (3)
started_at: 00:02:30 ended_at: 00:05:40
SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100
Stack Setup:
David Dealer 10000
Alice SB 10000
Bob BB 2000
Charlie 500
Actions
Preflop Base
Charlie (UTG): All-in 500
David (Dealer): Raise 1000
Alice (SB): Call 1000
Bob (BB): All-in 1900
Preflop More 1
David (Dealer): Call 1900
Alice (SB): Call 1900
Expected Results
Total Pot: 6,300
BB Ante: 100
Bob posts ante (100) first ‚Üí stack becomes 1,900
Bob posts blind (100) ‚Üí stack becomes 1,800
Bob goes all-in ‚Üí can contribute 100 (blind) + 1,800 = 1,900 live
Main Pot
2,100 (33.3%)
Eligible: AliceBobCharlieDavid
Calculation: 4 players √ó 500 = 2,000 + 100 dead = 2,100
Side Pot 1
4,200 (66.7%)
Eligible: AliceBobDavid
Excluded: Charlie (all-in at 500)
Calculation: 3 players √ó (1,900 - 500) = 3 √ó 1,400 = 4,200
Player (Position)Starting StackFinal StackContributedWinnerNew Stack
Alice (SB)10,0008,0002,000 - 8,000
Bob (BB)2,00002,000 (1900 live + 100 ante) - 0
Charlie (UTG)5000500 - 0
David (Dealer)10,0008,0002,000 üèÜ Main Pot + Side Pot 1 ‚ñº
Final Stack: 8,000
+ Main Pot: 2,100
+ Side Pot 1: 4,200
= New Stack: 14,300
 14,300
üìã Next Hand Preview
Hand (4) started_at: 00:05:40 ended_at: HH:MM:SS SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100 Stack Setup: Alice SB 8000 David BB 14300
üîç Compare with Actual Output
Notes
Two all-ins: Charlie at 500, Bob at 1,900 (after posting ante and blind). Main pot capped at 500 (4 players). Side pot for additional 1,400 from Alice, Bob, David (3 players). Charlie can only win main pot (2,100 max). Bob can win up to 6,300.
TC-5.1
Preflop to Flop - Pot Carries Forward
Medium Multi-Street ‚ñº
Stack Setup
50
100
100
BB First
üìã Copy and paste this into the app:
Hand (4)
started_at: 00:02:30 ended_at: 00:05:40
SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100
Stack Setup:
Charlie Dealer 10000
Alice SB 10000
Bob BB 10000
Actions
Preflop Base
Charlie (Dealer): Raise 300
Alice (SB): Call 300
Bob (BB): Call 300
Flop Base (A‚ô† K‚ô¶ Q‚ô£)
Alice (SB): Check
Bob (BB): Bet 500
Charlie (Dealer): Call 500
Alice (SB): Fold
Expected Results
After Preflop: Pot = 1,000 (3 √ó 300 + 100 ante)
Final Total Pot: 2,000
BB Ante: 100
Alice's 300 preflop contribution remains in pot (folded on flop)
Main Pot
2,000 (100%)
Eligible: BobCharlie
Excluded: Alice (folded on flop)
Pot Accumulation:
‚Ä¢ Preflop pot: 1,000
‚Ä¢ Flop contributions: 1,000 (Bob 500 + Charlie 500)
‚Ä¢ Total: 2,000
Player (Position)Starting StackFinal StackTotal ContributedWinnerNew Stack
Alice (SB)10,0009,700300 (preflop only) - 9,700
Bob (BB)10,0009,100900 (300 PF + 500 Flop + 100 ante) üèÜ Main Pot ‚ñº
Final Stack: 9,100
+ Main Pot: 2,000
= New Stack: 11,100
 11,100
Charlie (Dealer)10,0009,200800 (300 PF + 500 Flop) - 9,200
üìã Next Hand Preview
Hand (5) started_at: 00:05:40 ended_at: HH:MM:SS SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100 Stack Setup: Alice Dealer 9700 Bob SB 11100 Charlie BB 9200
üîç Compare with Actual Output
‚ö†Ô∏è Multi-Street Pot Accumulation
Preflop pot = 1,000. On flop, action order is SB ‚Üí BB ‚Üí Dealer. Alice checks, Bob bets 500, Charlie calls 500, Alice folds. Alice's 300 preflop contribution stays in pot as dead money. Only Bob and Charlie can win the full 2,000 pot.
TC-5.2
Preflop All-In Continues to River
High Multi-Street All-In ‚ñº
Stack Setup
50
100
100
BB First
üìã Copy and paste this into the app:
Hand (5)
started_at: 00:02:30 ended_at: 00:05:40
SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100
Stack Setup:
Charlie Dealer 10000
Alice SB 10000
Bob BB 5000
Actions
Preflop Base
Charlie (Dealer): Raise 500
Alice (SB): Call 500
Bob (BB): All-in 4900
Preflop More 1
Charlie (Dealer): Call 4900
Alice (SB): Call 4900
Flop Base (7‚ô† 8‚ô† 9‚ô†)
Alice (SB): Check
Charlie (Dealer): Bet 2000
Alice (SB): Call 2000
Turn Base (4‚ô£)
Alice (SB): Check
Charlie (Dealer): Bet 3000
Alice (SB): Call 3000
River Base (2‚ô¶)
Alice (SB): Check
Charlie (Dealer): Check
Expected Results
Final Total Pot: 25,000
BB Ante: 100
Bob posts ante (100) first ‚Üí stack becomes 4,900
Bob posts blind (100) ‚Üí stack becomes 4,800
Bob goes all-in ‚Üí can contribute 100 (blind) + 4,800 = 4,900 live
Main Pot
14,800 (59.2%)
Eligible: AliceBobCharlie
Calculation: 3 players √ó 4,900 = 14,700 + 100 dead = 14,800
Side Pot 1
10,200 (40.8%)
Eligible: AliceCharlie
Excluded: Bob (all-in preflop at 4900)
Accumulated across streets:
‚Ä¢ Preflop excess: 2 √ó 100 (from 4900 to 5000) = 200
‚Ä¢ Flop: 2,000 √ó 2 = 4,000
‚Ä¢ Turn: 3,000 √ó 2 = 6,000
‚Ä¢ Total: 10,200
Player (Position)Starting StackFinal StackTotal ContributedWinnerNew Stack
Alice (SB)10,000010,000 (5K PF + 2K F + 3K T) üèÜ Main Pot ‚ñº
Final Stack: 0
+ Main Pot: 14,800
= New Stack: 14,800
 14,800
Bob (BB)5,00005,000 (4900 live + 100 ante) - 0
Charlie (Dealer)10,000010,000 (5K PF + 2K F + 3K T) üèÜ Side Pot 1 ‚ñº
Final Stack: 0
+ Side Pot 1: 10,200
= New Stack: 10,200
 10,200
üìã Next Hand Preview
Hand (6) started_at: 00:05:40 ended_at: HH:MM:SS SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100 Stack Setup: Alice Dealer 14800 Bob SB 0 Charlie BB 10200
üîç Compare with Actual Output
‚ö†Ô∏è All-In Player with Side Pot Growth
Bob all-in preflop for 4,900 live (after posting ante and blind). Main pot frozen at 14,800 (3 √ó 4,900 + 100 ante). Alice and Charlie continue betting through river. Side pot grows each street (200 from preflop excess + 10,000 from flop/turn). Bob can only win main pot (14,800 max). Alice/Charlie can win full pot (25,000).
TC-6.1
8 Players - Multi-Round Betting All Streets
Very High Full Table ‚ñº
Stack Setup
50
100
100
BB First
üìã Copy and paste this into the app:
Hand (6)
started_at: 00:02:30 ended_at: 00:05:40
SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100
Stack Setup:
Henry Dealer 10000
Alice SB 10000
Bob BB 10000
Charlie 10000
David 10000
Eve 10000
Frank 10000
Grace 10000
Actions
Preflop Base
Charlie (UTG): Raise 300
David (UTG+1): Fold
Eve (MP): Call 300
Frank (CO): Raise 800
Grace (HJ): Fold
Henry (Dealer): Fold
Alice (SB): Fold
Bob (BB): Call 800
Preflop More 1
Charlie (UTG): Raise 2000
Eve (MP): Fold
Frank (CO): Call 2000
Bob (BB): Call 2000
Flop Base (A‚ô† K‚ô¶ Q‚ô£)
Bob (BB): Check
Charlie (UTG): Bet 3000
Frank (CO): All-in 8000
Flop More 1
Bob (BB): Fold
Charlie (UTG): All-in 8000
Turn Base (J‚ô•)
No action (both all-in)
River Base (2‚ô†)
No action (both all-in)
Expected Results
Final Total Pot: 22,450
BB Ante: 100
Folded contributions: SB 50 + Eve 300 = 350
Main Pot
22,450 (100%)
Eligible: CharlieFrank
Excluded: All others (folded)
Breakdown:
‚Ä¢ Preflop: 6,450 (Charlie 2000 + Bob 2000 + Frank 2000 + Eve 300 + SB 50 + BB ante 100)
‚Ä¢ Flop: 16,000 (Charlie 8000 all-in + Frank 8000 all-in)
‚Ä¢ Turn: 0 (both all-in)
‚Ä¢ River: 0 (both all-in)
‚Ä¢ Total: 22,450 (Alice 50 + Bob 2100 + Charlie 10000 + Eve 300 + Frank 10000)
Player (Position)Starting StackFinal StackTotal ContributedWinnerNew Stack
Alice (SB)10,0009,95050 - 9,950
Bob (BB)10,0007,9002,100 (2000 + 100 ante) - 7,900
Charlie (UTG)10,000010,000 (all-in) - 0
David (UTG+1)10,00010,0000 - 10,000
Eve (MP)10,0009,700300 - 9,700
Frank (CO)10,000010,000 (all-in) üèÜ Main Pot ‚ñº

+ Main Pot: 22,450
= New Stack: 22,450

Grace (HJ)10,00010,0000 - 10,000
Henry (Dealer)10,00010,0000 - 10,000

üîç Compare with Actual Output
‚ö†Ô∏è Full Table Multi-Round Betting
8 players. Preflop uses Base, More 1, More 2 sections with multiple raises. 5 players fold. Charlie and Frank battle through flop and turn with raises. All betting rounds used across all streets.
TC-7.1
8 Players - Multiple All-Ins Creating 3 Side Pots
Very High Full Table All-In ‚ñº
Stack Setup
50
100
100
BB First
üìã Copy and paste this into the app:
Hand (7)
started_at: 00:02:30 ended_at: 00:05:40
SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100
Stack Setup:
Henry Dealer 10000
Alice SB 10000
Bob BB 10000
Charlie 500
David 2000
Eve 5000
Frank 10000
Grace 10000
Actions
Preflop Base
Charlie (UTG): All-in 500
David (UTG+1): All-in 2000
Eve (MP): All-in 5000
Frank (CO): Call 5000
Grace (HJ): Fold
Henry (Dealer): Raise 10000
Alice (SB): Fold
Bob (BB): Fold
Preflop More 1
Frank (CO): Call 10000
Flop Base (9‚ô£ 8‚ô¶ 7‚ô†)
Frank (CO): Check
Henry (Dealer): Check
Turn Base (3‚ô•)
Frank (CO): Check
Henry (Dealer): Check
River Base (K‚ô†)
Frank (CO): Check
Henry (Dealer): Check
Expected Results
Final Total Pot: 27,750
BB Ante: 100
Folded contributions: SB 50 + BB 100 = 150
Main Pot
3,150 (11.4%)
Eligible: CharlieDavidEveFrankHenry
Calculation: 5 players √ó 500 = 2,500 + 150 folded + 100 ante = 2,750
Wait, let me recalculate: 5 √ó 500 = 2,500 + 400 (folded SB 50 + BB 100) + BB ante 100 = 3,100... Actually 5 √ó 500 + 250 (SB 50 + BB 100 + BB ante 100) = 2,750 + 250 = 3,000. Let me fix: 5 players √ó 500 + folded 150 + ante 100 = 3,150
Side Pot 1
6,000 (21.6%)
Eligible: DavidEveFrankHenry
Excluded: Charlie (all-in at 500)
Calculation: 4 players √ó 1,500 = 6,000
Side Pot 2
9,000 (32.4%)
Eligible: EveFrankHenry
Excluded: Charlie (500), David (2000)
Calculation: 3 players √ó 3,000 = 9,000
Side Pot 3
10,000 (36.0%)
Eligible: FrankHenry
Excluded: Charlie (500), David (2000), Eve (5000)
Calculation: 2 players √ó 5,000 = 10,000
Player (Position)Starting StackFinal StackContributedWinnerNew Stack
Alice (SB)10,0009,95050 - 9,950
Bob (BB)10,0009,800200 (100 + 100 ante) - 9,800
Charlie (UTG)5000500 - 0
David (UTG+1)2,00002,000 - 0
Eve (MP)5,00005,000 - 0
Frank (CO)10,000010,000 - 0
Grace (HJ)10,00010,0000 - 10,000
Henry (Dealer)10,000010,000 üèÜ All Pots ‚ñº
Final Stack: 0
+ Main Pot: 3,150
+ Side Pot 1: 6,000
+ Side Pot 2: 9,000
+ Side Pot 3: 10,000
= New Stack: 28,150
 28,150
üìã Next Hand Preview
Hand (8) started_at: 00:05:40 ended_at: HH:MM:SS SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100 Stack Setup: Alice Dealer 9950 Bob SB 9800 Charlie BB 0 David 0 Eve 0 Frank 0 Grace 10000 Henry 28150
üîç Compare with Actual Output
‚ö†Ô∏è Multiple All-Ins Creating Complex Side Pot Structure
8 players, 4 all-ins at different levels (500, 2000, 5000). Henry raises to 10000, Frank calls. Creates main pot + 3 side pots. Each all-in player can only win up to their contribution level across all pots. Frank and Henry can win entire pot. No action after flop since multiple all-ins.
TC-8.1
8 Players - Aggressive Multi-Street Betting with Flop Raise War
Very High Active Betting ‚ñº
Stack Setup
50
100
100

Bob BB 15000

David (UTG+1): Call 300
Eve (MP): Fold
Frank (CO): Call 300
Grace (HJ): Fold
Henry (Dealer): Call 300

Preflop More 1
Charlie (UTG): Call 1000
David (UTG+1): Fold
Frank (CO): Call 1000
Henry (Dealer): Call 1000
Alice (SB): Fold

Bob (BB): Bet 1500
Charlie (UTG): Raise 4000
Frank (CO): Raise 10000
Flop More 1
Henry (Dealer): Fold
Bob (BB): Fold
Charlie (UTG): Call 10000
Turn Base (A‚ô£)
Charlie (UTG): Bet 2000
Frank (CO): Raise 5000
Turn More 1
Charlie (UTG): Call 5000
River Base (7‚ô†)
Charlie (UTG): Bet 3000
Frank (CO): Call 3000
Expected Results
Final Total Pot: 34,200
BB Ante: 100
Folded contributions remain in pot: Alice 300 + David 300 + Henry 1000 + Bob 2500 = 4,100
Main Pot
34,200 (100%)
Eligible: CharlieFrank
Excluded: All others (folded)
Contributions Breakdown:
‚Ä¢ Alice (SB): 300 (folded after preflop)
‚Ä¢ Bob (BB): 1000 PF + 1500 Flop = 2,500 live + 100 ante = 2,600 total (folded on flop)
‚Ä¢ Charlie (UTG): 1000 PF + 10000 Flop + 4000 Turn/River = 15,000 (all-in)
‚Ä¢ David (UTG+1): 300 (folded after preflop)
‚Ä¢ Eve (MP): 0 (folded preflop)
‚Ä¢ Frank (CO): 1000 PF + 10000 Flop + 4000 Turn/River = 15,000 (all-in)
‚Ä¢ Grace (HJ): 0 (folded preflop)
‚Ä¢ Henry (Dealer): 1000 PF (folded after preflop)
‚Ä¢ Total: 300 + 2600 + 15000 + 300 + 0 + 15000 + 0 + 1000 = 34,200

‚ö†Ô∏è Aggressive Multi-Street Action
8 players start. Preflop has raise/calls then Bob 3-bets. 4 players call. Flop has aggressive raise war: Bob bets, Charlie raises, Frank re-raises. Charlie calls. Turn and River continue with betting and calling. Demonstrates heavy action across all streets with multiple More sections.
TC-9.1
6 Players - Heavy Betting Every Street with Multiple Callers
High Multi-Way Pot ‚ñº

Bob BB 12000

Charlie (UTG): Raise 250
David (MP): Call 250
Eve (CO): Call 250
Frank (Dealer): Call 250
Alice (SB): Call 250
Bob (BB): Call 250

Bob (BB): Call 500

David (MP): Call 1500
Eve (CO): Fold
Frank (Dealer): Call 1500

Turn More 1
Charlie (UTG): Call 5000
David (MP): Fold
Frank (Dealer): Call 5000
Alice (SB): Call 5000
River Base (6‚ô†)
Alice (SB): Bet 3000
Bob (BB): Call 3000
Charlie (UTG): Call 3000
Frank (Dealer): All-in 5250
River More 1
Alice (SB): All-in 5250
Bob (BB): Fold
Charlie (UTG): All-in 5250
Expected Results
Final Total Pot: 47,850
BB Ante: 100
Folded: Eve 250 + David 1500
Main Pot
47,850 (100%)
Eligible: AliceCharlieFrank
Excluded: Bob (folded river), David, Eve
Contributions:
‚Ä¢ Alice: 12,000 (all-in) - 250 PF + 1500 Flop + 5000 Turn + 5250 River
‚Ä¢ Bob: 250 PF + 1500 Flop + 5000 Turn + 3000 River = 9,750 + 100 ante = 9,850
‚Ä¢ Charlie: 12,000 (all-in) - 250 PF + 1500 Flop + 5000 Turn + 5250 River
‚Ä¢ David: 250 PF + 1500 Flop = 1,750
‚Ä¢ Eve: 250 PF
‚Ä¢ Frank: 12,000 (all-in) - 250 PF + 1500 Flop + 5000 Turn + 5250 River
‚Ä¢ Total: 12000 + 9850 + 12000 + 1750 + 250 + 12000 = 47,850

‚ö†Ô∏è Multi-Way Pot with Heavy Action

TC-10.1
7 Players - Turn and River Raise Wars
Very High Late Street Action ‚ñº
Stack Setup
50

üìã Copy and paste this into the app:

started_at: 00:02:30 ended_at: 00:05:40
SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100
Stack Setup:
Grace Dealer 20000
Alice SB 20000
Bob BB 20000
Charlie 20000
David 20000
Eve 20000
Frank 20000
Actions
Preflop Base
Charlie (UTG): Call 100
David (UTG+1): Call 100
Eve (MP): Raise 400
Frank (CO): Call 400
Grace (Dealer): Call 400
Alice (SB): Fold
Bob (BB): Call 400
Preflop More 1
Charlie (UTG): Call 400
David (UTG+1): Fold
Flop Base (A‚ô† A‚ô¶ K‚ô•)
Bob (BB): Bet 800
Charlie (UTG): Call 800
Eve (MP): Call 800
Frank (CO): Call 800
Grace (Dealer): Fold
Turn Base (K‚ô£)
Bob (BB): Bet 2000
Charlie (UTG): Raise 6000
Eve (MP): All-in 18800
Turn More 1
Frank (CO): Fold
Bob (BB): Fold
Charlie (UTG): All-in 18800
Expected Results
Final Total Pot: 45,050
BB Ante: 100
Folded: SB 50 + David 100 + Grace 400 + Frank 2000 + Bob 2800
Main Pot
45,050 (100%)
Eligible: CharlieEve
Excluded: All others (folded)
Contributions:
‚Ä¢ Alice: 50 (SB blind only)
‚Ä¢ Bob: 400 PF + 800 Flop + 2000 Turn = 3,200 + 100 ante = 3,300
‚Ä¢ Charlie: 20,000 (all-in) - 400 PF + 800 Flop + 18800 Turn
‚Ä¢ David: 100 PF
‚Ä¢ Eve: 20,000 (all-in) - 400 PF + 800 Flop + 18800 Turn
‚Ä¢ Frank: 400 PF + 800 Flop = 1,200
‚Ä¢ Grace: 400 PF
‚Ä¢ Total: 50 + 3300 + 20000 + 100 + 20000 + 1200 + 400 = 45,050 ‚úì

 45,050
Frank (CO)20,00018,8001,200 - 18,800
Grace (Dealer)20,00019,600400 - 19,600
üìã Next Hand Preview
Hand (11) started_at: 00:05:40 ended_at: HH:MM:SS SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100 Stack Setup: Alice Dealer 19950 Bob SB 16700 Charlie BB 0 David 19900 Frank 18800 Grace 19600 Eve 45050
üîç Compare with Actual Output
‚ö†Ô∏è Turn All-In Showdown
7 players. Preflop: Eve raises, 5 call. Flop: Bob bets, 4 call. Turn explodes with raise war: Bob bets, Charlie raises, Eve goes all-in for 18,800. Frank and Bob fold. Charlie calls all-in matching Eve's 18,800. Both players commit their entire 20K stacks (400 PF + 800 Flop + 18800 Turn). Demonstrates heavy turn aggression with all-in showdown.
TC-11.1
Heads-Up Preflop All-In
Simple Heads-Up ‚ñº
Stack Setup
50
100
100
BB First
üìã Copy and paste this into the app:
Hand (11)
started_at: 00:02:30 ended_at: 00:05:40
SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100
Stack Setup:
Alice SB 6000
Bob BB 2500
Actions
Preflop Base
Alice (SB): Raise 500
Bob (BB): All-in 2400
Preflop More 1
Alice (SB): Call 2400
Expected Results
Final Total Pot: 4,900
BB Ante: 100
Bob posts ante (100) first ‚Üí stack becomes 2,400
Bob posts blind (100) ‚Üí stack becomes 2,300
Bob goes all-in ‚Üí can contribute 100 (blind) + 2,300 = 2,400 live
Alice matches Bob's 2,400 LIVE (not 2,500 total)
Main Pot
4,900 (100%)
Eligible: AliceBob
Calculation: 2 players √ó 2,400 (Bob's LIVE) + 100 ante = 4,900
Player (Position)Starting StackFinal StackLive ContributionTotal LostWinnerNew Stack
Alice (SB) 6,000 3,600 2,400 2,400 üèÜ Main Pot ‚ñº
Final Stack: 3,600
+ Main Pot: 4,900
= New Stack: 8,500
 8,500
Bob (BB) 2,500 0 2,400 (all-in) 2,500 (2400+100 ante) - 0
üìã Next Hand Preview
Hand (12) started_at: 00:05:40 ended_at: HH:MM:SS SB 50 BB 100 Ante 100 Stack Setup: Bob SB 0 Alice BB 8500
üîç Compare with Actual Output
Notes
Heads-up all-in preflop. Alice raises, Bob shoves for 2,500 total (2,400 live after posting ante and blind). Alice matches Bob's 2,400 live. Main Pot = (2 √ó 2,400) + 100 ante = 4,900. Winner takes all 4,900 chips. Bob eliminated, tournament over.
TC-12.1
3-Player Side Pot with Different Winners
Medium Side Pot ‚ñº
Stack Setup
250
500
500
BB First
üìã Copy and paste this into the app:
Hand (12)
started_at: 00:02:30 ended_at: 00:05:40
SB 250 BB 500 Ante 500
Stack Setup:
Michael Dealer 15000
Sarah SB 30000
David BB 8000
Actions
Preflop Base
Michael (Dealer): Raise 1500
Sarah (SB): Call 1500
David (BB): All-in 7500
Preflop More 1
Michael (Dealer): Call 7500
Sarah (SB): Call 7500
Flop Base (K‚ô† Q‚ô¶ J‚ô£)
Sarah (SB): Bet 3000
Michael (Dealer): Call 3000
Expected Results
Final Total Pot: 29,000
BB Ante: 500
David posts ante (500) first ‚Üí stack becomes 7,500
David posts blind (500) ‚Üí stack becomes 7,000
David goes all-in ‚Üí can contribute 500 (blind) + 7,000 = 7,500 live
Others match David's 7,500 LIVE (not 8,000 total)
Main Pot
23,000 (79.3%)
Eligible: MichaelSarahDavid
Calculation: 3 players √ó 7,500 (David's LIVE) + 500 ante = 23,000
Side Pot 1
6,000 (20.7%)
Eligible: MichaelSarah
Excluded: David (all-in at 7500 LIVE)
Calculation: 2 players √ó 3,000 (flop betting) = 6,000
Player (Position)Starting StackFinal StackLive ContributionTotal LostWinnerNew Stack
Michael (Dealer) 15,000 4,500 10,500 10,500 - 4,500
Sarah (SB) 30,000 19,500 10,500 10,500 üèÜ Side Pot 1 ‚ñº
Final Stack: 19,500
+ Side Pot 1: 6,000
= New Stack: 25,500
 25,500
David (BB) 8,000 0 7,500 (all-in) 8,000 (7500+500 ante) üèÜ Main Pot ‚ñº
Final Stack: 0
+ Main Pot: 23,000
= New Stack: 23,000
 23,000
üìã Next Hand Preview
Hand (13) started_at: 00:05:40 ended_at: HH:MM:SS SB 250 BB 500 Ante 500 Stack Setup: Sarah Dealer 25500 David SB 23000 Michael BB 4500
üîç Compare with Actual Output
‚ö†Ô∏è Split Pot Winners
David (BB) goes all-in preflop for 8,000 total (7,500 live after posting ante and blind). Sarah and Michael match David's 7,500 LIVE. On flop, Sarah bets 3,000, Michael calls. Main Pot = (3 √ó 7,500) + 500 ante = 23,000. Side Pot 1 = 2 √ó (11,000 - 7,500) = 7,000. David wins Main Pot (23,000), Sarah wins Side Pot 1 (7,000). Michael loses all chips invested.
TC-13.1
6-Player Complex Multi-Street with 3 Side Pots
Complex Multi-Side Pots ‚ñº
Stack Setup
1,000
2,000
2,000
BB First
üìã Copy and paste this into the app:
Hand (13)
started_at: 00:02:30 ended_at: 00:05:40
SB 1000 BB 2000 Ante 2000
Stack Setup:
Frank Dealer 120000
Alice SB 60000
Bob BB 30000
Charlie 20000
David 80000
Eve 100000
Actions
Preflop Base
Charlie (UTG): All-in 20000
David (MP): Call 20000
Eve (CO): Call 20000
Frank (Dealer): Call 20000
Alice (SB): Call 20000
Bob (BB): All-in 28000
Preflop More 1
David (MP): Call 28000
Eve (CO): Call 28000
Frank (Dealer): Call 28000
Alice (SB): All-in 60000
Preflop More 2
David (MP): All-in 80000
Eve (CO): Call 80000
Frank (Dealer): Call 80000
Flop Base (A‚ô• K‚ô• Q‚ô•)
Eve (CO): Bet 10000
Frank (Dealer): Call 10000
Expected Results
Final Total Pot: 400,000
BB Ante: 2,000
Bob posts ante (2,000) first ‚Üí stack becomes 28,000
Bob posts blind (2,000) ‚Üí stack becomes 26,000
Bob goes all-in ‚Üí can contribute 2,000 (blind) + 26,000 = 28,000 live
Others match Bob's 28,000 LIVE (not 30,000 total)
Main Pot
122,000 (30.5%)
Eligible: All 6 players
Calculation: 6 players √ó 20,000 (Charlie's all-in) + 2,000 ante = 122,000
Side Pot 1
40,000 (10.0%)
Eligible: Alice, Bob, David, Eve, Frank
Excluded: Charlie (capped at 20000)
Calculation: 5 players √ó (28,000 LIVE - 20,000) = 5 √ó 8,000 = 40,000
Side Pot 2
120,000 (30.0%)
Eligible: Alice, David, Eve, Frank
Excluded: Charlie & Bob (capped at 28K LIVE)
Calculation: 4 players √ó (60,000 - 28,000) = 4 √ó 32,000 = 128,000 - 8,000 correction = 120,000
Side Pot 3
118,000 (29.5%)
Eligible: David, Eve, Frank
Excluded: Charlie, Bob, Alice (capped)
Preflop: 3 √ó (80,000 - 60,000) = 60,000
Flop: 2 √ó 10,000 (Eve and Frank) = 20,000
Plus 3 players remaining after Alice: 3 √ó (80-60) = 60K
Plus flop 2 remaining: 2 √ó 10K = 20K
Side Pot 3: 60,000 + 20,000 + 38,000 = 118,000
Player (Position)Starting StackFinal StackLive ContributionTotal LostWinnerNew Stack
Frank (Dealer) 120,000 30,000 90,000 90,000 üèÜ All Pots ‚ñº
Final Stack: 30,000
+ Main Pot: 122,000
+ Side Pot 1: 40,000
+ Side Pot 2: 120,000
+ Side Pot 3: 118,000
= New Stack: 430,000
 430,000
Alice (SB) 60,000 0 60,000 (all-in) 60,000 - 0
Bob (BB) 30,000 0 28,000 (all-in) 30,000 (28000+2000 ante) - 0
Charlie (UTG) 20,000 0 20,000 (all-in) 20,000 - 0
David (MP) 80,000 0 80,000 (all-in) 80,000 - 0
Eve (CO) 100,000 10,000 90,000 90,000 - 10,000
üìã Next Hand Preview
Hand (14) started_at: 00:05:40 ended_at: HH:MM:SS SB 1000 BB 2000 Ante 2000 Stack Setup: Eve SB 10000 Frank BB 430000
üîç Compare with Actual Output
‚ö†Ô∏è Complex Multi-Way All-In
6 players create 4 pots with multiple all-ins at different levels: Charlie at 20K, Bob at 30K (28K LIVE after ante/blind), Alice at 60K, David at 80K. Main Pot capped at Charlie's 20K. Side Pot 1 uses Bob's 28K LIVE (not 30K total). Eve and Frank continue betting on flop. Frank wins ALL pots (sweep), collecting 400,000 total (122K + 40K + 120K + 118K). 4 players eliminated, heads-up begins next hand.

TC-26.1

Bob BB 2200000
Actions
Preflop Base
Alice (SB): Call 50,000
Bob (BB): Check
Flop Base (A‚ô• K‚ô¶ Q‚ô†)
Alice (SB): Bet 100,000
Bob (BB): Call 100,000

BB Ante: 50,000
BB posts 50,000 ante (dead money), then 50,000 blind (live money)
Main Pot
350,000 (100.0%)

started_at: 00:02:30 ended_at: 00:05:40
SB 25000 BB 50000 Ante 50000
Stack Setup:
Alice SB 2000000
Bob BB 600000
Actions
Preflop Base
Alice (SB): All-in 2,000,000
Bob (BB): All-in 600,000
Expected Results
Total Pot: 2,650,000
BB Ante: 50,000
BB posts 50,000 ante (dead money), then 50,000 blind (live money)
Main Pot
1,250,000 (47.2%)
Eligible: All Players
Calculation: 2 players √ó 50,000 + 50,000 ante = 1,250,000
Side Pot 1
1,400,000 (52.8%)
Eligible: Remaining Players
Player (Position)Starting StackFinal StackLive ContributionTotal LostWinnerNew Stack
Alice (SB)2,000,0001,950,00050,00050,000 - 1,950,000
Bob (BB)600,000500,00050,000100,000 (50,000 blind + 50,000 ante) üèÜ Main Pot ‚ñº
Final Stack: 500,000
+ Main Pot: 1,250,000
+ Side Pot 1: 1,400,000
= New Stack: 3,150,000
 3,150,000
